t: Amazon.com: AllFuel HST
s: AllFuel HST offers 6" and 8" inner diameter Class-A chimney pipe and stove pipe for wood stoves, fireplaces, fireboxes, outdoor furnaces, water heaters, boilers, pizza ovens and more. Meets UL 103 HT standard for high temperature chimney.
